snippet: A group of professional diplomats wants to make sure that American ambassadors have street cred before they are sent to run U.S. embassies overseas — and not just big money or high status....

headline.print_headline: Career Diplomats Eye Credentials for Ambassadors
headline.main: Career Diplomats Eye Credentials for Ambassadors

lead_paragraph: A group of professional diplomats wants to make sure that American ambassadors have street cred before they are sent to run U.S. embassies overseas — and not just big money or high status.
